other.text: The building went through a complex and time-consuming process of 30 , and the famous monument was finally reopened on December 8, 2024.

definition.zh_def: 消耗，使用或攝取（食物、資源等）。
definition.en_def: To use up a resource or to eat or drink something.
definition.example: We need to consume less energy to protect the environment.
